languages.text: {n}Вы резко отворачиваетесь от экрана — и чувствуете, будто с вас спадают невидимые оковы. Спустя мгновение приходит осознание: вы боролись не с собственным любопытством, а чьей-то злой волей, которая теперь не властна над вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы резко отворачиваетесь от экрана — и чувствуете, будто с вас спадают невидимые оковы. Спустя мгновение приходит осознание: вы боролись не с собственным любопытством, а чьей-то злой волей, которая теперь не властна над вами.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realisation comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы резко отворачиваетесь от экрана — и чувствуете, будто с вас спадают невидимые оковы. Спустя мгновение приходит осознание: вы боролись не с собственным любопытством, а чьей-то злой волей, которая теперь не властна над вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realization comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}

{n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realization comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}

{n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realization comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}

{n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realisation comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你急忙转过了身，背对着屏幕。那一刻，你几乎感觉到某种无形的枷锁从身上脱落下来。过了一会儿，你意识到，你刚刚并不是在与自己的好奇心作斗争，而是在与某种邪恶的意志作斗争。如今，你已经摆脱了它对你的钳制。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realisation comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你急忙转过了身，背对着屏幕。那一刻，你几乎感觉到某种无形的枷锁从身上脱落下来。过了一会儿，你意识到，你刚刚并不是在与自己的好奇心作斗争，而是在与某种邪恶的意志作斗争。如今，你已经摆脱了它对你的钳制。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te giras con ímpetu para dar la espalda a la pantalla y casi puedes sentir cómo se rompen las cadenas invisibles. Tardas unos segundos en comprender que no era tu propia curiosidad lo que te forzaba a mirar, sino una voluntad malévola cuya influencia acabas de rechazar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realisation comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te giras con ímpetu para dar la espalda a la pantalla y casi puedes sentir cómo se rompen las cadenas invisibles. Tardas unos segundos en comprender que no era tu propia curiosidad lo que te forzaba a mirar, sino una voluntad malévola cuya influencia acabas de rechazar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはとっさに画面から目をそらし…同時に、目に見えない足かせが外れていくのを感じた。しばらくして、ようやく気がついた。あなたは自分の好奇心と戦っていたのではなく、誰かの不浄の意志と戦っていたことに。そして今、ようやくそれがあなたを手放したことに。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realisation comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはとっさに画面から目をそらし…同時に、目に見えない足かせが外れていくのを感じた。しばらくして、ようやく気がついた。あなたは自分の好奇心と戦っていたのではなく、誰かの不浄の意志と戦っていたことに。そして今、ようやくそれがあなたを手放したことに。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du wendest dich mit Gewalt von dem Bildschirm ab – und kannst fast spüren, wie unsichtbare Fesseln von dir abfallen. Einen Augenblick später überkommt dich eine Erkenntnis: Du hast nicht gegen deine eigene Neugierde gekämpft, sondern gegen einen bösartigen Willen, der nun seinen Einfluss auf dich verloren hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realisation comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du wendest dich mit Gewalt von dem Bildschirm ab – und kannst fast spüren, wie unsichtbare Fesseln von dir abfallen. Einen Augenblick später überkommt dich eine Erkenntnis: Du hast nicht gegen deine eigene Neugierde gekämpft, sondern gegen einen bösartigen Willen, der nun seinen Einfluss auf dich verloren hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous détournez brusquement de l'écran, non sans avoir l'impression de sentir des chaînes invisibles se dissiper. Un instant plus tard, vous comprenez : vous ne luttiez pas contre votre propre curiosité, mais contre la volonté malveillante de quelqu'un qui a maintenant perdu son emprise sur vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realisation comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous détournez brusquement de l'écran, non sans avoir l'impression de sentir des chaînes invisibles se dissiper. Un instant plus tard, vous comprenez : vous ne luttiez pas contre votre propre curiosité, mais contre la volonté malveillante de quelqu'un qui a maintenant perdu son emprise sur vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir çırpıda kendini ekrandan koparıyor, âdeta görünmez zincirlerden serbest kaldığını hissediyorsun. Bir müddet sonra kendi merakınla değil, bir başkasının art niyetine karşı savaştığının farkına varıyorsun. Bu art niyetin üzerindeki etkisinden kurtulmuş durumdasın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn sharply away from the screen — and you can almost feel invisible shackles falling away. The realisation comes a moment later: you were not fighting against your own curiosity, but against someone's malevolent will, which has now lost its hold on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir çırpıda kendini ekrandan koparıyor, âdeta görünmez zincirlerden serbest kaldığını hissediyorsun. Bir müddet sonra kendi merakınla değil, bir başkasının art niyetine karşı savaştığının farkına varıyorsun. Artık bu art niyetin senin üstünde bir etkisi yok.{/n}
